sentences.sContent: fields where they used to graze their sheep

remMethod.val: 放牧(graze)的小孩盯着(gaze)吃草(graze)的羊群

words.tran: 放牧人；畜牧业者；牧场主
擦过；放牧（graze的过去分词）；抓破

trans.tranOther: if an animal grazes, or if you graze it, it eats grass that is growing

trans.tranCn: 放牧；擦伤； 擦过， 掠过
trans.tranOther: to accidentally break the surface of your skin by rubbing it against something
a wound caused by rubbing that slightly breaks the surface of your skin
